user_query: I'm throwing a party for my friends and I want to surprise them with some unique cocktails. Can you fetch me a detailed recipe for the cocktail with ID 45? Additionally, provide me with the latest stock open and close prices for Qualcomm. Oh, and don't forget to give me the upcoming sports odds for the sport 'upcoming' in the US region. Thanks!

TaskList.description: Fetch the detailed recipe for the cocktail with ID 45.
Retrieve the latest stock open and close prices for Qualcomm.
Get the upcoming sports odds for the specified sport 'upcoming' in the US region.
